data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Can Ostersund capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hacken's half?
In the minute 7, It's a goal kick for the home team in Gothenburg.
In Gothenburg, Hacken push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Ostersund have a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Hacken's Alexander Soderlund gets in a shot on goal at Bravida Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Adam Ladeback signals a throw-in for Hacken, close to Ostersund's area.
Corner awarded to Hacken.
In the minute 11, Alexander Soderlund (Hacken) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Ostersund at Bravida Arena.
Ostersund are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Hacken close to the penalty box.
Adam Ladeback awards Ostersund a goal kick.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Viktor Lundberg.
In the minute 13, Leo Bengtsson with an assist there.
Ostersund have been awarded a corner by Adam Ladeback.
Free kick for Hacken in their own half.
In the minute 16, Ball goes out of play for a Hacken goal kick.
Adam Ladeback signals a free kick to Hacken in their own half.
Ostersund have a goal kick.
In the minute 19, Hacken drive upfield and Viktor Lundberg gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Ostersund defender.
Ostersund awarded a free kick in their own half.
Adam Ladeback awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 21, Hacken needs to be cautious. Ostersund have an attacking throw-in.
Adam Ladeback signals a Ostersund throw-in in Hacken's half.
In Gothenburg Ostersund attack through Blair Turgott. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 22, Adam Ladeback awards Hacken a goal kick.
In Gothenburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ostersund awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 24, Ostersund have been awarded a corner by Adam Ladeback.
Adam Ladeback signals a free kick to Hacken in their own half.
Henrik Bellman is booked for the away team.
In the minute 28, Ball goes out of play for a Ostersund goal kick.
Free kick for Ostersund in their own half.
Can Ostersund get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hacken's half?
In the minute 30, Throw-in high up the field for Hacken in Gothenburg.
Can Hacken capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Free kick in a good position for Ostersund!
In the minute 33, Corner awarded to Ostersund.
In Gothenburg, Leo Bengtsson (Hacken) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Ostersund at Bravida Arena.
In the minute 37, Hacken have been awarded a corner by Adam Ladeback.
Erik Friberg (Hacken) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Ostersund to take a throw-in in Hacken territory.
In the minute 38, Adam Ladeback signals a free kick to Hacken in their own half.
Hacken have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Hacken in the half of Ostersund.
In the minute 42, Leo Bengtsson of Hacken is pulled up for offside.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Gothenburg.
Hacken push upfield but Adam Ladeback quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 45, Ostersund awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Hacken in their own half.
The first-half is over at Bravida Arena.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Ostersund are whistled for offside.
Hacken awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 48, Ostersund drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Ostersund have a dangerous throw-in.
Alexander Soderlund of Hacken smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 53, Free kick for Ostersund in their own half.
Throw-in for Ostersund in their own half.
Corner awarded to Hacken.
In the minute 56, Joona Toivio of Hacken gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Ostersund goal kick.
Goal! Blair Turgott (Ostersund) levels the score at 1-1 with a header.
In the minute 59, That's a fine assist from Henrik Bellman.
Ostersund's Blair Turgott is on target but unsuccessful.
Hacken needs to be cautious. Ostersund have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 63, Ball safe as Hacken is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Hacken awarded a free kick in their own half.
Adam Ladeback signals a free kick to Ostersund in their own half.
In the minute 64, Throw-in Hacken.
Goal kick for Ostersund at Bravida Arena.
In the minute 67, Hacken have been awarded a corner by Adam Ladeback.
Andreas Alm (Hacken) is making a first substitution, with Patrik Walemark replacing Viktor Lundberg.
Throw-in high up the field for Ostersund in Gothenburg.
Throw-in for Hacken at Bravida Arena.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to Hacken.
Hacken's Erik Friberg breaks free at Bravida Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Gothenburg.
In the minute 70, Ostersund have a goal kick.
Adam Ladeback signals a free kick to Hacken.
Adam Ladeback signals a throw-in for Hacken, close to Ostersund's area.
In the minute 72, Adam Ladeback awards Ostersund a goal kick.
Adam Ladeback awards the home team a throw-in.
Hacken drive forward but Leo Bengtsson is judged offside.
In the minute 76, Hacken have been awarded a corner by Adam Ladeback.
Can Hacken capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ostersund's half?
Marco Weymans is replacing Henrik Bellman for Ostersund at Bravida Arena.
In the minute 77, Malcolm Stolt is on a sub for Francis Jno-Baptiste for Ostersund.
Ostersund's Blair Turgott misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 78, Goal kick for Hacken at Bravida Arena.
The home team have replaced Alexander Soderlund with Ali Youssef. This is the second substitution made today by Andreas Alm.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Ostersund in their own half.
In the minute 80, It's a goal kick for the home team in Gothenburg.
Adam Ladeback signals a Hacken throw-in in Ostersund's half.
Corner awarded to Hacken.
In the minute 83, Hacken's Rasmus Lindgren scores with his head to give his side a 2-1 lead.
Leo Bengtsson instrumental with a fine assist.
Hacken drives forward and Erik Friberg gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 86, Ostersund awarded a free kick in their own half.
Amir Azrafshan is making the team's third substitution at Bravida Arena with Nebiyou Perry replacing Marco Weymans.
Adam Ladeback signals a free kick to Hacken in their own half.
In the minute 87, Andreas Alm (Hacken) is making a third substitution, with Johan Hammar replacing Ahmed Yasin.
Andreas Alm is making the team's fourth substitution at Bravida Arena with Oskar Sverrisson replacing Adam Andersson.
Ostersund will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Hacken.
In the minute 89, Eirik Haugan (Ostersund) gets a yellow card.
Free kick for Ostersund in their own half.
Adam Ladeback will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Hacken at Bravida Arena.
Throw-in Ostersund.
Throw-in for Hacken in the half of Ostersund.
Ostersund awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Ostersund in the half of Hacken.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Hacken.
Throw-in for Ostersund in their own half.
Can Hacken get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ostersund's half?
It's 2-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Erik Friberg (Hacken) has received a yellow card from Adam Ladeback.
